query.statement:
SELECT '' AS RECIPE_CLASS, '' AS RECIPE_CLASS_NAME FROM DUAL UNION ALL
SELECT '' AS RECIPE_CLASS, 'ÀüÃ¼' AS RECIPE_CLASS_NAME FROM DUAL UNION ALL
SELECT RECIPE_CLASS, RECIPE_CLASS_NAME FROM (SELECT A.RECIPE_CLASS, CODE_NAME AS RECIPE_CLASS_NAME FROM FSA_UPJANG_RECIPE_LINK A, SCC_COMMON_CODE B WHERE A.UPJANG = #UPJANG# AND A.RECIPE_CLASS=B.CODE AND B.GROUP_CODE ='FS0001' AND B.USE_YN='Y' ORDER BY B.SORT_SEQ)
